sentences.en: Friends provided a vindication of his position.
sentences.cn: 朋友们提供了对他的观点的辩护.

sentences.en: He will receive blessing from the LORD and vindication from God his Savior.
sentences.cn: 他必蒙耶和华赐福,又蒙救他的神使他成义.

sentences.en: I wanted the full Vindication for testing purposes.
sentences.cn: 我点满了辩护是想测试一下它的效果[按:指2.3的辩护改动].

sentences.en: May my vindication come from you; may your eyes see what is right.
sentences.cn: 2愿我的判语从你面前发出; 愿你的眼睛观看公正.

sentences.en: NIV He will receive blessing from the Lord and vindication from God his Savior.
sentences.cn: [和合]他必蒙耶和华赐福,又蒙救他的神使他成义.

sentences.en: NIV May my vindication come from you; may your eyes see what is right.
sentences.cn: 2[和合]愿我的判语从你面前发出, 愿你的眼睛观看公正.

sentences.en: Or maybe we're searching for forgiveness -- or vindication.
sentences.cn: 或许我们是在寻求原谅 ─ ─或是辩解.

sentences.en: The result was a vindication of all our efforts.
sentences.cn: 这一结果表明我们的一切努力是必要的.

sentences.en: There is much to be said in vindication of his claim.
sentences.cn: 有很多理由可以提出来为他的要求作辩护.

sentences.en: These results are no more than a vindication of commonsense analysis.
sentences.cn: 这些结果只不过是按常理分析得出的事实。

sentences.en: Truth is generally the best vindication against slander.
sentences.cn: 事实通常是防备诋毁的最佳辩护.

sentences.en: Vindication: This effect will no longer be absorbed by Grounding Totem.
sentences.cn: 辩护: 该效果不再被根基图腾吸收.

sentences.en: Wollstonecraft , Mary. A Vindication of the Rights of Woman . Edited by Brody. New York: Penguin, 1992.
sentences.cn: 玛丽? 沃尔斯通克拉夫特,《女权辩护》. 米瑞恩?布罗迪编辑. 纽约: 企鹅出版社, 1992版.

words.tran_cn: 维护；证明…无辜；证明…正确

trans.tran_cn: （对所受到的责难或嫌疑的）澄清，证实，辩护
